2. add my ID TZTJMVI-A72GGKG-XC6PPU6-VFZX5SM-KUNL4BZ-PNUCO5E-UJIDJW5-WYZVPAO

> [p2p](#comment_205_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): BT-Sync-like solution is good for this kind of use. 1 year ago, syncthing was not suitable for publicly publish (can't discover and connect all peers automatically, only suitable for private sync). is it suitable now?

if you select the introducer option yes

> [p2p](#comment_208_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): great! the  introducer option is newly added? the publisher side select it?

no, you need to select it

> [p2p](#comment_209_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): me? the receiver side?

yes so you connect to more peers that connect to me node

> [p2p](#comment_210_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): do u have to manually add my node and allow transfer to me? or it allow me connect u automatically?

well i got two people connected, one is  100% sync other is 0% i dont know who is you
